content: ✨ english pattern written in english in uk & usstandard terms note this is a listing for a crochet pattern and is delivered via digital instant download once your payment is submitted you will receive an email from etsy with the link to download pattern downloadable crochet pattern - bertie bee description this is a pattern for the bertie bee perfect gift for anyone language english uk & us crochet terms size the bee is approx 9-10cm long skill level beginner materials you will need crochet hook - 4mm yarn i used dk yarn scissors safety eyes fibrefill tapestry/wool needle safety note make sure each piece of the lovey is firmly and securely sewn together so that it cannot pull apart check toys regularly for loose parts and wear and tear if you intend to sell your finished item as the maker of these items you are responsible for marketing a safe toy please make sure they comply with the legal requirements of the respective country in which the toy is going to be sold visit me instagram - https //www instagram com/emkatcrochet/ facebook - https //www facebook com/emkatcrochet/ thank you for visiting my shop if you have any questions while crocheting your bertie bee please feel free to contact me with love helen♥
